name: Sci-Farm Cafe
description:
His skills in the kitchen are a little rusty, but his laser gun is full of plasma. Let the sparks and patties fly as you help our robo-friend cook to infinite and beyond!

Controls:

F - Shoot

E - Grab dropped item

Spacebar - Cook

Tab - Finish cooking

Arrow keys - move

At end of game:

N - restart game

Z - return to Main Menu

Team Members:

Studio A.Z.H.Y.A. - https://studio-azhya.itch.io/
